BR_text.BRsummary: Unable to add contributors to namespace
BR_text.BRdescription:
/kind bug
 
 Kubeflow is not allowing to add contributors to namespace.
 <denchmark-link:https://camo.githubusercontent.com/c6ff4cb9885b506a2e821f4c2fb92146c85261557d9c5d00732a90e32af8a060/68747470733a2f2f692e696d6775722e636f6d2f414d306b4f6c742e706e67></denchmark-link>
 
 <denchmark-link:https://camo.githubusercontent.com/3fd831e4dc2b032ffe9b0be9b87f3854479b1e8d84ff4a10236e762c6f38add7/68747470733a2f2f692e696d6775722e636f6d2f4a50546d504c582e706e67></denchmark-link>
 
 
 Contributors like '<denchmark-link:mailto:whatevername@mail.com>whatevername@mail.com</denchmark-link>
 ' get added to my namespace..
 Environment:
 
 Kubeflow version: 0.7
 Kubernetes platform: GKE
